items.title: Booking Retrieval Form Validation
items.description: Implement form validation for the manage booking form to ensure users provide required information before attempting to retrieve their booking.
items.userStory: As a customer visiting Emirates.com, I want to receive clear validation messages when I try to retrieve my booking without providing complete information, so that I understand what information is required and can successfully access my booking.
acceptanceCriteria: When user clicks 'Check In' without entering surname, display 'Please enter a family name and booking reference'
When user enters only surname without booking reference, display validation message
When user enters only booking reference without surname, display validation message
Form fields should be clearly marked as required
Validation messages should be user-friendly and specific
Form should not submit until all required fields are completed
